data.news_body: In furtherance to our letter No. JKB/BS/F3652/2022/031 dated May 10, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the transcript of the earnings call held on  May 12, 2022 by the Bank in relation to the financial results of the Bank for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for REVIEWED FINANCIAL RESULTS OF THE BANK FOR THE QUARTER AND HALF YEAR ENDED  30TH  SEPTEMBER, 2021 (STANDALONE & CONSOLIDATED)
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 and 52 read with Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith a copy of the Reviewed Financial Results of the Bank for the Quarter and Half year ended 30th September, 2021.
The Results were taken on record by the Board of Directors in their meeting held today i.e. 12th November, 2021.
The Meeting started at 12:00 P.M. and ended at 03:45 P.M.
This is for your information and appropriate dissemination
